cgu.title: Terms of Use

1.title: 1. Purpose
1.content: These terms govern access to and use of the website https://www.domaineberthuit.com, published by Domaine Berthuit. By browsing this site, the user accepts these terms without reservation.

2.title: 2. Services Offered
2.content: The site allows users to discover the winery, book tours and tastings, purchase products, and stay informed about our news.

3.title: 3. Access and Use
3.content: Access is free and reserved for adults. The publisher makes every effort to ensure constant availability of the site.

4.title: 4. User Accounts
4.content: Some features require an account. Users are responsible for keeping their login details secure.

5.title: 5. Bookings and Orders
5.content: Bookings may be free or paid. Payments are secured through Stripe.

6.title: 6. Personal Data
6.content: Personal data is collected for site operation. See our Privacy Policy for more.

7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
7.content: All content on the site is protected. Reproduction without permission is prohibited.

8.title: 8. Liability
8.content: The publisher is not liable for service interruptions, third-party content, or partner failures.

9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
9.content: Terms may change at any time and apply immediately upon publication.

10.title: 10. Governing Law – Disputes
10.content: These terms are governed by French law. Disputes will be handled by French courts.
